welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bismil, Turkey! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Bismil has to offer.

restaurants.name: Masal Cafe & Nargile

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Diyarbakir Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Diyarbakir Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
